titles.title: Public Housing Development Reform Amendments

To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts with high-performing public housing agencies to provide for the development of public housing in a manner that eliminates time-consuming interim review procedures otherwise required.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 4/12/1994--Introduced. Public Housing Development Reform Amendments - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts with high-performing public housing agencies to eliminate certain housing development interim review procedures.
